title: Bontemps and Givony
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Tim Bontemps about the East Finals, then ESPN's Jonathan Givony dishes on the lottery and the draft -- and a special appearance by former Suns coach Jay Triano on the Valley Oop.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
